sentences.en: A few other conditions are in high intestinal obstruction.
sentences.cn: 其它少数情况是高位肠梗阻.

sentences.en: an operation to remove an obstruction from her throat
sentences.cn: 去除她喉咙里阻塞物的手术

sentences.en: John was irritated by drivers parking near his house and causing an obstruction.
sentences.cn: 约翰对那些在他家附近泊车堵住通道的司机感到恼火。

sentences.en: Mr Guest refused to let them in and now faces a criminal charge of obstruction.
sentences.cn: 格斯特先生因为将他们拒之门外，现在面临妨碍公务的刑事指控。

sentences.en: Obstruction of the bile duct is associated with cholangitis.
sentences.cn: 胆管梗阻能并发胆管炎.

sentences.en: Obstruction of the ileum by stone leads to distinct clinical pictures.
sentences.cn: 回肠胆结石梗阻可引起各种明显的临床征象.

sentences.en: Police can remove a vehicle that is causing an obstruction.
sentences.cn: 警察有权把造成阻塞的车辆移走。

sentences.en: She had to have surgery to remove an obstruction from her throat.
sentences.cn: 为去除咽喉里的堵塞物,她不得不接受手术.

sentences.en: The acute abdominal pain of intestinal obstruction usually fluctuates.
sentences.cn: 肠梗阻时的急性腹痛常不稳定.

sentences.en: The asylum seekers had to contend with continued bureaucratic obstruction.
sentences.cn: 寻求政治庇护的人得不断地应付官僚主义的层层阻挠.

sentences.en: The boy was suffering from a bowel obstruction and he died.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩因患肠梗阻死去了。

sentences.en: The lorry had been parked on the pavement, causing an obstruction.
sentences.cn: 卡车停在人行道上, 引起了堵塞.

sentences.en: The road was cleared from obstruction .
sentences.cn: 那条路已被清除了障碍。

sentences.en: The traffic flowed round the obstruction in the road.
sentences.cn: 来往车辆绕过路上的障碍物行驶.

sentences.en: Total regurgitation of swallowed material without any nausea whatsoever suggests esophageal obstruction.
sentences.cn: 将所进食物全部反出而不伴任何恶心,即说明有食管梗阻.

sentences.en: Your interference is an obstruction of justice.

words.tran_cn: 阻挠议事的；蓄意阻挠的

phrases.tran_cn: 妨碍司法公正；阻碍司法

trans.tran_cn: 障碍物，阻碍的行为或例子，阻碍，受阻，妨碍议事
trans.tran_en: when something blocks a road, passage, tube etc, or the thing that blocks it
